Class DebugUtil

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Contains utilities to debug code, such as logging objects

        materials - to pick from

      • formatBlock

        public static java.lang.String formatBlock(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
        Formats all the properties of a block to a String. Uses format:
        #world [#x, #y, #z] #type
        Parameters:
        block - to format
        Returns:
        Formatted String

      • formatBlock

        public static java.lang.String formatBlock(org.bukkit.block.Block block,
                           java.lang.String format)
        Formats all the properties of a block to a String
        #x = Block X
        #y = Block Y
        #z = Block Z
        #world = World name
        #typeid = Block Type Id
        #type = Block Type
        Parameters:
        block - to format
        format - to use
        Returns:
        Formatted String

      • heartbeat

        public static void heartbeat()
        Broadcasts HEARTBEAT with the current time
        Can be used to check if a ticked object is still alive
